Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course

Class Course

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.Activity
      • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.Course
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Conflict, java.lang.Comparable<Course>
    public class Course
extends Activity
implements java.lang.Comparable<Course>
    Course class for WolfScheduler maintains the information about the Course's name, title, section, credits, instructor ID, meeting days, and start and end time. Makes sure the name, title, section, credits, instructor ID, and start and end times are valid. Has a short and long display arrays to populate rows of the course catalog and student schedule and to display the final schedule in the WolfScheduler GUI. Also checks if a Course has a duplicate Course with the same name.
    Author:
    Alexander May, Brian Yngve, Ashley John

    • Constructor Detail

      • Course

        public Course​(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String title,
              java.lang.String section,
              int credits,
              java.lang.String instructorId,
              java.lang.String meetingDays,
              int startTime,
              int endTime)
        Creates a Course with the given name, title, section, credits, instructorId, and meetingDays for courses that are arranged.
        Parameters:
        name - name of Course
        title - title of Course
        section - section of Course
        credits - credit hours for Course
        instructorId - instructor's unity id
        meetingDays - meeting days for Course as series of chars
        startTime - start time for the Course
        endTime - end time for the Course
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if name is null or the length of the name is invalid
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if section is null or invalid length
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if credits are not between 1 and 5
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if instructor id is null or empty

      • setMeetingDaysAndTime

        public void setMeetingDaysAndTime​(java.lang.String meetingDays,
                                  int startTime,
                                  int endTime)
        Sets the meeting days and time for Course
        Overrides:
        setMeetingDaysAndTime in class Activity
        Parameters:
        meetingDays - the Course's meeting days
        startTime - the Course's start time
        endTime - the Course's end time
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if a meeting day string has more than one character, and its start and end time aren't equal to 0, only if the meeting day is 'A'
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the meeting day string contains characters other than M, T, W, T, H, F, or A
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if there the course meets more than once a day

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo​(Course s)
        Compares a given student object to this student object for order. The order will be checked in this format: ordered by last name, then first name, then Id
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Course>
        Parameters:
        s - Student object to be compared
        Returns:
        0 if the student objects are equal, 1 if the object is greater than the specified object, or -1 if the object is less than the specified object.
